creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
description: off-white background with supplimentary weft green, dark red, pink, mauve patterning at center--architecture with figures and animals around wood rod at top and fringe of bamboo pieces at bottom
dimension:
68 x 19 in. (172.72 x 48.26 cm) (including fringe)
24 in. (60.96 cm) (object part, cord at top)
3 1/2 in. (8.89 cm) (object part, 26 fringes made of pieces of bamboo and cotton, each)
title: Temple banner (Tung)
